name: WakeonLan(WoL)
0:
”Alexa, turn on the TV”
”Alexa, turn on the computer”
”Alexa, turn on the server”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use (English, CA)
Developer Terms of Use (Portuguese, BR)
Developer Terms of Use (English, IN)
Developer Terms of Use (English, AU)
des:
* FIRST OF ALL YOU HAVE TO ADD THE DEVICES ON THE WEBSITE HTTPS://WWW.WOLSKILL.COM

This skill only allows to turn on devices compatible with the technology "wake on lan".

Now with the desktop app you can PowerOFF your devices too!

Turn on devices on your network through Wake on Lan (WoL) technology. Add your devices (with a name and your MAC address) on the web HTTPS://WWW.WOLSKILL.COM, activate the Skill and search your devices!
To turn on your device you just have to say: "Alexa, turn on <device name>"
If the device is in the network of one of your amazon compatible devices will turn on immediately.
